title: Donald Trump Jr. on Impeachment & 2020 Elections
itunes:title: Donald Trump Jr. on Impeachment & 2020 Elections
description:
Kevin spoke with Donald Trump Jr., Executive Vice President of the Trump Organization and author of the new book: Triggered: How the Left Thrives on Hate and Wants to Silence Us.

Tom Perez, DNC Chairman discusses Tuesday's elections in Virginia, Kentucky and Mississippi, where Democrats have been spending energy and money to win several races for governor and state legislature.

Kevin also spoke with Brendan Buck, Former Spokesman & Advisor to House Speaker Paul Ryan and Partner at Seven Letter, and Alex Wayne, Bloomberg White House Lead Editor.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
